verses.verse: But now thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that created <S%H1254><s%> thee <S%H3290><s%>, O Jacob, and he that formed <S%H3335><s%> thee <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel: Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H1350><s%>, for I have redeemed thee <S%H7121><s%>; I have called thee by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, thou art mine.

When thou passest through <S%H5674><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, I will be with thee <S%H5104><s%>; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow <S%H7857><s%> thee <S%H3212><s%>: when thou walkest through <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, thou shalt not be burned <S%H3554><s%>, neither shall the flame <S%H3852><s%> kindle upon thee <S%H1197><s%>.

For I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thy Saviour <S%H3467><s%>; I have given <S%H5414><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> as thy ransom <S%H3724><s%>, Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and Seba in thy stead <S%H5434><s%>.

Since thou hast been precious <S%H3365><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>, and honorable <S%H3513><s%>, and I have loved <S%H157><s%> thee <S%H5414><s%>; therefore will I give men <S%H120><s%> in thy stead <S%H3816><s%>, and peoples instead of thy life <S%H5315><s%>.
Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H935><s%>; for I am with thee: I will bring thy seed <S%H2233><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> thee from the west <S%H4628><s%>;

I will say <S%H559><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%>, Give up <S%H5414><s%>; and to the south <S%H8486><s%>, Keep not back <S%H3607><s%>; bring <S%H935><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%> from far <S%H7350><s%>, and my daughters <S%H1323><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>;

every one <S%H3605><s%> that is called <S%H7121><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>, and whom I have created <S%H1254><s%> for my glory <S%H3519><s%>, whom I have formed <S%H3335><s%>, yea <S%H6213><s%>, whom I have made.
Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that have <S%H3426><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and the deaf <S%H2795><s%> that have ears <S%H241><s%>.

Let all the nations <S%H1471><s%> be gathered <S%H6908><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and let the peoples <S%H3816><s%> be assembled <S%H622><s%>: who among them can declare <S%H5046><s%> this <S%H8085><s%>, and show us former things <S%H7223><s%>? let them bring <S%H5414><s%> their witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, that they may be justified <S%H6663><s%>; or let them hear <S%H8085><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, It is truth <S%H571><s%>.

Ye are my witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and my servant <S%H5650><s%> whom I have chosen <S%H977><s%>; that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> and believe <S%H539><s%> me <S%H995><s%>, and understand that I am he <S%H6440><s%>: before me there was no God <S%H410><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%>, neither shall there be after me <S%H310><s%>.
I <S%H3068><s%>, even I, am Jehovah; and besides <S%H1107><s%> me there is no saviour <S%H3467><s%>.

I have declared <S%H5046><s%>, and I have saved <S%H3467><s%>, and I have showed <S%H8085><s%>; and there was no strange <S%H2114><s%> god among you <S%H5707><s%>: therefore ye are my witnesses, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and I am God <S%H410><s%>.
Yea <S%H3117><s%>, since the day was I am he <S%H5337><s%>; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand <S%H3027><s%>: I will work <S%H6466><s%>, and who can hinder it <S%H7725><s%>?

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, your Redeemer <S%H1350><s%>, the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: For your sake I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and I will bring down <S%H3381><s%> all of them <S%H1281><s%> as fugitives <S%H3778><s%>, even the Chaldeans, in the ships <S%H591><s%> of their rejoicing <S%H7440><s%>.
I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, your Holy One <S%H6918><s%>, the Creator <S%H1254><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, your King <S%H4428><s%>.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, who maketh <S%H5414><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and a path <S%H5410><s%> in the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>;

who bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and horse <S%H5483><s%>, the army <S%H2428><s%> and the mighty <S%H5808><s%> man <S%H7901><s%> (they lie down together <S%H3162><s%>, they shall not rise <S%H6965><s%>; they are extinct <S%H1846><s%>, they are quenched <S%H3518><s%> as a wick <S%H6594><s%>):
Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye not the former things <S%H7223><s%>, neither consider <S%H995><s%> the things of old <S%H6931><s%>.

Behold <S%H6213><s%>, I will do a new thing <S%H2319><s%>; now shall it spring forth <S%H6779><s%>; shall ye not know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H7760><s%>? I will even make a way <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert <S%H3452><s%>.

The beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall honor <S%H3513><s%> me <S%H8577><s%>, the jackals and the ostriches <S%H1323><s%>; because I give <S%H5414><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert <S%H3452><s%>, to give drink <S%H8248><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%>, my chosen <S%H972><s%>,
the <S%H2098><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> which I formed <S%H3335><s%> for myself <S%H5608><s%>, that they might set forth my praise <S%H8416><s%>.
Yet thou hast not called <S%H7121><s%> upon me <S%H3290><s%>, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary <S%H3021><s%> of me <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel.

Thou hast not brought <S%H935><s%> me of thy sheep <S%H7716><s%> for burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>; neither hast thou honored <S%H3513><s%> me with thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>. I have not burdened <S%H5647><s%> thee with offerings <S%H4503><s%>, nor wearied <S%H3021><s%> thee with frankincense <S%H3828><s%>.

Thou hast bought <S%H7069><s%> me no sweet cane <S%H7070><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%>, neither hast thou filled <S%H7301><s%> me with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>; but thou hast burdened <S%H5647><s%> me with thy sins <S%H2403><s%>, thou hast wearied <S%H3021><s%> me with thine iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
I <S%H4229><s%>, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions <S%H6588><s%> for mine own sake <S%H2142><s%>; and I will not remember thy sins <S%H2403><s%>.
Put me in remembrance <S%H2142><s%>; let us plead <S%H8199><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>: set thou forth <S%H5608><s%> thy cause <S%H6663><s%>, that thou mayest be justified.
Thy first <S%H7223><s%> father <S%H1><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and thy teachers <S%H3887><s%> have transgressed against me <S%H6586><s%>.

Therefore I will profane <S%H2490><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; and I will make <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a curse <S%H2764><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> a reviling <S%H1421><s%>.
